rdf:Description.dcterms:creator: kjohar
oha
rdf:Description.dcterms:description: This RDF vocabulary contains terms for use primarily in the context of the NISO Z39.98-2012 Newsfeeds Aggregator profile(http://www.daisy.org/z3998/2012/auth/profiles/newsfeeds/). It defines terms for semantic inflection of document content, and terms for article-level metadata.
rdf:Description.dcterms:title: Z39.98-2012 Periodicals Vocabulary

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: news
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An article or group of articles that contains current or recent news of either general interest or on a specific topic

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: feature
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An article which discusses a selected issue in-depth

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: review
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An evaluation of a publication or other item.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: advertisement
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An advertisement.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: editorial
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An article stating opinions or giving perspectives.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: commentary
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An article or posting containing commentary on a publication or other item.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: classifieds
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Classified advertisements.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: weather
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The weather forecast.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sports
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The sports section.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: headline
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The heading or title of an article

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: byline
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the names of the author(s) of an article or story, sometimes also giving credit for accompanying resources or information

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: dateline
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Indicates the time and/or place where an article or story was reported, occurred or was written

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: lead
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An initial segment of an article introducing and/or summarizing the content

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: deck
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A teaser segment near the title of an article.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: kicker
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A lead-out segment at the end of an article.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: continuation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to another part of the publication which contains the continuation of the current article

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: continuation-of
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A reference to a previous part of the publication that contains the initial part of the article that the current article is a continuation of

rdf:Bag.dcterms:title: Article aggregation metadata
rdf:Bag.dcterms:description: This set of article metadata terms are intended for use in aggregation contexts to maintain information about the location of source content segments, and to describe intended locations in the aggregation being built.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: positionSequence
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Holds ordinal information about the article within its parent section/sub section. For example, a value of 2 means that the article is the second article in its parent section/sub section. Is only relevant in instances where the instance document is being used to deliver a single article, or a collection of articles for one or more publications.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: positionSection
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Holds ordinal information about the parent section and or sub section(s) within a publication, that an article appears in. For example, a value of 1.2 means that an article appears in a section that is the first section in the publication, and a sub section that is the second subsection within the section;is only relevant in instances where the particular instance document is being used to deliver a single article, or a collection of articles for one or more publications.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: positionPage
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Holds information about the page that the article appears on in the publication. Is only relevant in instances where the Feeds Profile document instance is being used to deliver a single article, or a collection of articles for one or more publications.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: revision
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Holds revision information about the article. Is relevant in instances where the Feeds Profile instance document is being used to deliver a single article, or a collection of articles for one or more publications.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: destEdition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Holds information about an edition of a publication that the article is meant to appear in. Is only relevant in instances where the instance document is being used to deliver a single article, or a collection of articles for one or more publications; can appear more than once inside the Article head; each occurrence of destEdition holds information about a particular edition of a publication that the article is meant to appear in.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: destPublication
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Holds information about a publication that the article is meant to appear in; is only relevant in contexts where the instance document is being used to deliver a single article, or a collection of articles for one or more publications; can appear more than once inside the Article head; each occurrence of destPublication holds information about a particular publication that the article is meant to appear in.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sourceEdition
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Holds information about an edition of a publication that the article is originally a part of; is only relevant in instances where the instance document is being used to deliver a single article, or a collection of articles for one or more publications; can appear more than once inside the Article head; each occurrence of sourceEdition holds information about a particular edition of a publication that the article is originally a part of.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: sourcePublication
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Holds information about a publication that the article is originally a part of; is only relevant in contexts where the instance document is being used to deliver a single article, or a collection of articles for one or more publications; can appear more than once inside the Article head; each occurrence of sourcePublication holds information about a particular publication that the article is originally a part of.
